name: HardBall
description:
Cool and fun arcade game "HardBall" . In which you will meet with many obstacles,mines,barricades.
The game is a "Low poly" graphics.And a really fun achievement, one of a kind. A tightening game with a bunch of settings.
Nice music,each season the tracks will give you more variety.A large number of worlds, in which there are a lot of light urovine and other complex.
The goal of the game is to hold the ball on the platform and hit the end of the level.


Steep achievements to get them you need to play the game in 2017,2018,2019,2020.


Steep achievements in the form of letters.
